Bangladeshi Figures Place Floral Baskets before Portrait of Kim Il Sung 
   Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Figures of the Bangladesh People's League and the Study Centre of Independence on July 5 placed floral baskets before the portrait of President Kim Il Sung in the DPRK embassy in Dhaka before paying homage to him on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of his demise.

articles.content:
State Academy Ensemble of Ministry of Interior of Russia Arrives 
   Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The State Academy Ensemble of the Ministry of Interior of Russia led by its Chief Viktor Yeliseev arrived here Sunday.
 It was greeted at the airport by Vice Department Director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Pak Kyong Son, officials concerned and Russian Charge d' Affaires A. I. Alexander Matsegora here and embassy officials.

Special Bulletin Issued in Italy
articles.content:
Special Bulletin Issued in Italy
   Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy issued a special bulletin titled "July 8" on July 1 on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
 The bulletin praised Kim Il Sung as the national hero who wisely commanded the anti-Japanese armed struggle, liberating the Korean people from the Japanese imperialists' oppression, and defeated U.S. imperialism in the Korean war for the first time in history. His demise brought profound grief not only to the Korean people but to all people of the world struggling for liberation, freedom and national sovereignty, it noted.    
 Kim Jong Il has successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause started by the President, it said, stressing that he has not only firmly defended socialism in Korea but guaranteed peace in Asia and the rest of the world by pursuing an independent foreign policy based on the Songun politics.

articles.content:
Special Envoy of Indonesian President Winds Up His DPRK Visit
   Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Councilor to the president Nana Sutresna, special envoy of the Indonesian president, and his entourage flew back Saturday after winding up their three-day visit to the DPRK.
 The special envoy was seen off at the airport by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il, officials concerned and Indonesian Charge d' Affaires A.I. here Bambang Irawan K.    
 He visited Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory on Friday.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
   Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK-China Friendship Association led by Ri Yong Dok, vice-chairman of its Central Committee who is vice-director of the Pyongyang City Public Service Guidance Bureau, Saturday left here to visit China to participate in the celebrations of the 45th anniversary of the DPRK-China Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance.
 On the same day, a delegation of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries and the China-Korea Friendship Association led by Chairman of the above-said people's association Chen Haosu arrived here to attend the events celebrating the 45th anniversary of the treaty.
